A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am 43 years old which means I grew up with Star Wars\, had all the toys and have watched all the movies a million times. The last one I watched 3 times at the theater and many more since it opened. THIS EDITION OF STAR WARS I’LL WATCH A MILLION TIMES. i loved it! Not sure why others are soooo negative.
